ref.mixed-citation: Gautret P; Lagier JC; Parola P; Hoang VT; Meddeb L; Mailhe M; Doudier B; Courjon J; Giordanengo V; Vieira VE; Dupont HT; Honoré S; Colson P; Chabrière E; La Scola B; Rolain JM; Brouqui P; Raoult D, Hydroxychloroquine and azithromycin as a treatment of COVID-19: results of an open-label non-randomized clinical trial.
